entry.title: Notenik 6.2.0 Released

summary.p: Added a Custom URL Scheme for Notenik.

entry.content: Notenik can now be invoked by a URL starting with notenik://…. Both open and add commands are available. Get the open URL for a particular Note by selecting 'Copy Notenik URL' from the contextual menu for a Note's row on the List tab.

entry.title: Notenik 6.1.0 Released
entry.content:
A few improvements to Script execution:

  • Scripts now run asynchronously, so that they won't block the UI – no more spinning beach balls!

  • Added an indeterminate progress bar to the Scripter window to let the user know that the script is running.

  • Added a browse command to the Scripting engine. This can conveniently be placed at the end of a script in order to open a localhost URL displaying the local site just updated via the script.

entry.title: Notenik 5.8.0 and 5.8.1 Released
entry.content:
• Fixed a crash occurring when using Merge templates;
  • Fixed a bug resulting in a double descending sort;
  • Added page type as an additional column for notenik-index scripting input;
  • Tweaked the Linked Tags Variable Modifier to allow specification of CSS classes;
  • Added an Author Name variable modifier to specify last name only or last name first;
  • Added copyfile template command;
  • Added Image Name field label and type;
  • Added Minutes to Read field label and type;
  • Refactoring of file input/output routines.
